text:
sorry for a delay here.  2 thoughts:
1.  <@U1HKQRLMR> our repping firm, Aara wants to include the Video in their newsletter.  Curious of your thoughts here.  Previously, we were told we couldn’t do our own PR and kinda wanna ensure Google is OK with it before we include but I tend to be over caustious so I’m curious of your thoughts here.  
2.  We have a ton of photos we can draw from for posting.  google approved oour social media messaging and some directional photos in the past.  I think we’re safe to include stuff that doesnt a )show anyone from IonTank b) show WIP/unfinished structural stuff c) doesn’t include guest names.  Pick some out:

<https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B2saO1SetZcbZG9VR0x0V1R1VTQ>
To clarify, were they thinking of just linking to the Vimeo video in the newsletter and not embedding it?

<@U0265G76F> megan and I talked and we agree - while google didn’t allow us to do our own PR, Aara linking to our already existing Case Study shouldn’t be an issue.  Aara has a deadline of tomorrow so we’re gonna get em some text and get it to them
